name: Holo Corp 2022
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

In a future where religion and robotics rule the world, the Holo Corp cult has you and your ally's bodies. In a holographic form, you will have to play and take turns controlling a combat robot, using traps to defeat the powerful Boss!

Platform: PC
Engine: Unity
Number of player: 2

Producer : Océane QUIMPERT, Thomas CLEMENT
Game Art : Lucille MOREAU, Jin LINGZI, Martin PARET, Nolwenn TREICH, Noémie DUMONT
Game Design : Aldaberto CUELLO, Antoine GUERIN, Jules GUYOMARCH
Game Design & Programming : Aymerick HEBERT, Maximilien SADI KORICHENE
Game Programming : Aubin VAN OLDEN BARNEVELD, Duncan FORTUNA, Johan MENARD
Music & Sound Design : Johan BECART
